about_the_game:
Play as a contestant on the most violent game show of all time, The Kill Zone! In this top-down shooter, you'll murder hundreds of attackers in brutal fashion on your way to epic showdowns against challenging bosses. Dual-stick controls allow you to move and attack in all directions. Crouch behind objects or roll to evade attacks.

Try not to feel too bad for the attackers as you slaughter them in a blood bath. We get to know more about certain attackers in the 'Featured Story' segment, where we take a look into their personal life and motivation for joining The Kill Zone, right before entering the arena and facing certain death. Other segments throughout the show will keep you entertained, as well as a rowdy announcer calling all the action.

Features:
  • 10 Diverse Contestants: Unlock up to 10 characters, each with unique attributes that will help or hurt you in the competition.
  • 5 Arenas: Play in 5 different arenas, each with it's own unique set of weapons. Ten levels in all.
  • Leaderboard: Track your all time kills and see where you match up with players from around the world.
  • Co-operative Multiplayer: Support for up to 4 players using Photon Pun.
  • Gamepad Support: Support for Xbox and PS4 style gamepads.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes depictions of violence and blood.

detailed_description:
Play as a contestant on the most violent game show of all time, The Kill Zone! In this top-down shooter, you'll murder hundreds of attackers in brutal fashion on your way to epic showdowns against challenging bosses. Dual-stick controls allow you to move and attack in all directions. Crouch behind objects or roll to evade attacks.

Try not to feel too bad for the attackers as you slaughter them in a blood bath. We get to know more about certain attackers in the 'Featured Story' segment, where we take a look into their personal life and motivation for joining The Kill Zone, right before entering the arena and facing certain death. Other segments throughout the show will keep you entertained, as well as a rowdy announcer calling all the action.

Features:
  • 10 Diverse Contestants: Unlock up to 10 characters, each with unique attributes that will help or hurt you in the competition.
  • 5 Arenas: Play in 5 different arenas, each with it's own unique set of weapons. Ten levels in all.
  • Leaderboard: Track your all time kills and see where you match up with players from around the world.
  • Co-operative Multiplayer: Support for up to 4 players using Photon Pun.
  • Gamepad Support: Support for Xbox and PS4 style gamepads.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac® High Sierra v10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac® High Sierra v10.13
  • Processor: Intel i5 processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: The Kill Zone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD FX 4350 or Equivalent, Intel Core i3 6300 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD FX 4350 or Equivalent, Intel Core i3 6300 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: In the future, the #1 network tv show in the world is The Kill Zone. It's also the deadliest! Murder waves of attackers with weapons ranging from medieval to sci-fi, as they charge at you with wiffle ball bats and paintball guns. Play alone, or with up to three friends in multiplayer co-op.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Bangla, Hindi
*languages with full audio support
